name: Wacky Dog
description:
THE CHASE IS ON! Try to stay alive as long as possible in this amazing #1 thrilling and action packed jumping adventure. Meet wacky dog, he needs your help!

~~~NOTE: STAY AWAY FOR THE BEE'S or tap on them to kill them~~~

Game Features:

  • - Simple one touch controls.
  • - Easy and fun to play, but a challenge to fully master.
  • - Retro 8 Bit graphics and sounds :-)
  • - Google+ Leaderboard, compare your best score with your friends.
  • - Achievements

How to Play:

  1. - Tap on the left side of the screen to perform a low jump and tap on the right side for a high jump.
  2. - Try to get some coins, because coins are extra bonus points!

Credit for Graphics:
Audrey Vleugels / www.audreyvleugels.nl

Youtube Demo:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8PeGSU1HQig

Install via the Play Store via the next link:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com....
